# add(in:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the indexes in an index range to the receiver.

## Declaration

```swift
func add(in range: NSRange)
```

## Parameters

- **range**: Index range to add. Must be in the range `0 .. NSNotFound - 1`.

## Discussion

This method raises an [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSExceptionName/rangeException] when `range` would add an index that exceeds the maximum allowed value for unsigned integers.

## Adding Indexes

- **add(_:)**: Adds an index  to the receiver.
- **add(_:)**: Adds the indexes in an index set to the receiver.
